statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchase_amount FROM customer_data WHERE customer_gender = 'F' ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM customer_data ORDER BY last_purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customer_data WHERE total_purchase_amount > 500.00;
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender, total_purchase_amount FROM customer_data WHERE customer_age < 40 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchase_amount FROM customer_data WHERE customer_gender = 'F' AND last_purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, total_purchase_amount FROM customer_data WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 45 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_purchase_amount FROM customer_data WHERE customer_age < 30 AND customer_gender = 'M';
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE birth_date >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING transaction_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email, birth_date FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE c.customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, signup_date FROM customers ORDER BY signup_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, segment_name FROM customers INNER JOIN customer_segments ON customers.customer_id = customer_segments.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE signup_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT c.customer_name, p.purchase_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id
SELECT cs.segment_name, cs.segment_description FROM customer_segments cs WHERE cs.segment_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT p.purchase_date, c.customer_name, cs.segment_name FROM purchases p JOIN customers c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN customer_segments cs ON c.customer_id = cs.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, registration_date FROM customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, registration_date FROM customers WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, registration_date FROM customers WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, region FROM customers INNER JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date, amount FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE amount > 100.00 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE birth_date > '1980-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 100;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM segments;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE birth_date BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name='Smith' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, description FROM products WHERE price < 50.00 AND product_category='Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount, product_name FROM orders JOIN transactions ON orders.order_id = transactions.order_id WHERE quantity > 2;
